docs.title: Home
docs.text:
(yet another) Python project template

Yet another Python project template.

docs.title: Install
docs.text:
(TODO replace) To install the package from PyPI: 

pip install python_project_template

docs.title: Development
docs.text:
Clone the repository: 

git clone https://github.com/marcofavorito/python-project-template
cd python-project-template

Set up virtual environment using Poetry: 

poetry shell
poetry install

docs.title: Tests
docs.text:
To run tests: tox

To run only the code tests: tox -e py312

To run only the linters: - tox -e ruff-check - tox -e ruff-format - tox -e mypy

Please look at the tox.ini file or run tox -l for the full list of supported commands. Please look at the tox.ini file for the full list of supported commands.

docs.title: Docs
docs.text:
To build the docs: mkdocs build

To view documentation in a browser: mkdocs serve and then go to http://localhost:8000
